description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman 2014 New Year's Hack
description: Puresabe’s hack to celebrate the year of the horse in 2014!

name: Maleficia: Nekomimi's Field
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Rocks
description: Space Rocks is an impressive blending of the classic arcade games Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe, crafted for the Atari 2600 by Darrell Spice, Jr. If you're a fan of either arcade cabinet (or both!), you'll love Space Rocks! While Atari's version of Asteroids for the 2600 was passable at the time of its release, Space Rocks blasts far ahead of this early effort. Taking full advantage of the DPC+ mode in our Melody Board, Space Rocks pushes the Atari 2600 to its limits and offers a wide variety of gameplay options to keep you playing for years to come. The graphics, animations, and sound effects are well above what is typically experienced on the 2600.

name: Let's Sing 6: Version Espanola
description: Sin descripción

name: The Groundskeeper
description: After a horrific accident, you find yourself trapped in an unfamiliar place where no one can hear you scream. There's a dark presence... A dark secret that this place holds. Is there any way out? Is HE watching?

name: New Super Mario Bros 3. DS
description: An exhaustive hack of New Super Mario Bros DS, this hack replaces all of the level layouts with those of Super Mario Bros. 3, along with a couple of other miscellaneous levels from other games.

name: Snail Bob 4: Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Angry Birds: Star Wars
description: Angry Birds: Star Wars is a bootleg port of the game with the same name for the Sega Genesis. It was developed by BMB and released sometime after 2012, as this was the release year of the mobile game.

name: Cropple
description: Plant carrots, lettuce, eggplants, onions, and melons in this colorful puzzle game! Line up your crops in vertical or horizontal rows to clear them! When all of your crops are harvested and your weeds and gophers are gone, you've won!

name: Rummikub
description: Now it's time to play Rummikub free online against real players or AI. The basic goal of the tile-matching game is to create melds of number tiles in your hand. You get 14 tiles at the game start, and have to create groups or runs on your turn. A group is a combination of three or four tiles with the same face value, but of different color, such as blue 8 + red 8 + back 8. A run is a sequence of numbers of the same color, e.g. red 2, 3, 4 and 5. On your turn, you get a tile and have to create melts using the tiles on the table, and the initial has to score at least 30 points. This online board game requires matching and strategy skills, and is fun for kids and adults to play.

name: Z Day Shootout
description:
Do you love old school shooters ? Z Day Shootout is just that! Lot of weapons, lot of zombies. Just search and destroy! It happend so fast! We didn't see it coming! The Virus was Spreading So quickly!... Soon everyone got infected! Well, not everyone... There is still a few of us. Fighting. Surviving! I was chosen for this mission! Best survivor, best GUNMAN! It's up to me to clean this Town of the Undead!

So What are you waiting for ? Pick up Your GUN and DO the Dirty Work! Good Luck. You're gonna need it!

name: Otoranger
description: Sin descripción

name: NagiQ 2: Treasure Hunt
description: NagiQ 2 is a family-friendly, original and challenging word game! Conquer 75 boards full of fun with words! This time Nagi has found a treasure map and is now embarked on an adventure to conquer 5 islands and 75 boards full of fun with words! He’s after all of the treasures and a lot of coins! In NagiQ 2 you’ll enjoy an original gameplay based on combining words on boards to win coins, defeat an evil pirate, win prizes, punch evil skulls, explode monsters, trim mustaches and prove that you are the ultimate wizard of word games!

name: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples
description: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples is a thrilling casual game.

name: Codename: Cupid
description: Codename: Cupid is a spy based romance game and was released on the Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: Epic War Saga
description: Epic War Saga, also known as Epic War MMO, or in the case of the relaunch, EpicWar Saga, is the sixth Epic War Game. Epic War Saga has a large fan base, however, the rating is lower then some of the other Epic Wars due to the energy system. The energy system was eventually removed. Epic War Saga has been anticipated for re-release after popularity shortened from Flash Player's expiration.

name: Apple
description: Apple is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame made. It stars Píng Guǒ Zǐ, a girl who wears an apple costume. She cannot leave her room, so the only thing she can do is sleep in her bed and dream.

name: Unable
description: Unable is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Bility, a girl whose right eye is bandaged up. The objective of the game is to collect effects and explore the dream world.

name: Empty
description: Empty is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Suo Xiangzi (锁箱子). Suo Xiangzi starts in her room, not able or unwilling to leave. Instead she can flick the light switch beside her bed to dream or access her computer to view wallpapers.

name: Bop It! Tetris
description:
A handheld game licensed by The Tetris Company and produced by Hasbro, this game features two LCD screens, with the smaller one on the shorter end and the wider one going around the body of the main unit. Game-play consists of the player twisting the shorter end to position the piece projected on the smaller screen above the gap in the pieces shown on the larger, twisting the smaller screen itself to rotate the piece itself in one direction or another, then squeezing both ends together to "drop" the piece in place.

On Marathon Mode the player is given three lives, and the time allotted the player to maneuver, rotate and drop the piece gets shorter as the game progresses. Should the player either fail to drop the piece in time, or they drop said piece in a way that any part of the piece would stick out of the top of the lower LCD screen, the player loses a life.

name: Escape From Roswell
description: Your alien friend landed unsuccessfully on earth and army arrested him at a secret location. Your task now is to find him.

name: Shall we date?: Pirates Treasured Love in the Ocean
description: Now included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: LEGO Super Heroes: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Play as Spider-Man and run across the city of New York! Dodge the dangerous obstacles and use your spiderwebs to sling to higher grounds. Will you be able to achieve the highest score?

name: Coma
description: Coma is a non-traditional platform Yume Nikki fangame made by Cheesecake.

name: The Shogi
description: The game has a free battle mode that you can play right away, and a level up mode that allows you to play against computers with 4 levels of strength under various conditions, allowing you to improve your skills while having fun. It also has a game record storage function and a two-player match function, allowing you to enjoy playing games with friends using a single Nintendo 3DS.

name: Itoshi no My Master
description:
Once there lived a normal madam and maid in a village.
They were perfectly normal.
Normal life, normal relationship, but kind of abnormal.
This is how things changed.

name: Castlemaze: Ojou-sama kara no Chousen
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Angry Birds V Rossii
description: Angry Birds in Russia (Angry Birds В России) is a puzzle game made by BMB, the same developer behind Felix the Cat, Mario 3: Around the World, and Darkwing Duck. There are no credits to be found inside the game to support this fully but it is speculated that it was published by Kudos.

name: Hello Kitty: Sweet Little Shops
description: Help your little one have fun while building math skills with this LeapFrog Sanrio Hello Kitty Sweet Little Shops 39131 learning game, which features 3 levels and 40 quests that challenge your child to estimate, use charts and graphs and more.

name: Battleship
description: Battleship is a free online game for 2 players. Arrange ships, wait for opponent and start playing.

name: Angry Birds Breakfast 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Bejeweled
description: Sin descripción

name: Core of Innocence
description: Core of Innocence is a platform adventure game in a similar vein to Castlevania.

name: Sailing Simulator: Baltic Sea & Caribbean
description: Sin descripción

name: Xterium: War of Alliances
description: Xterium is a space strategy game in real time. Research technologies with each giving various advantages. Start a computer technology to run a mission fleet. Weapons technology helps you to survive. Recruit a geologist to support the development of resources. You can also hire admiral, so you wouldn't lose control in battles. Expand the empire by constructing Metal Mine, Robot Factory, Solar Power plant, Shipyard, Research Lab, Deuterium Power Plant, and so on. You can have a clear review whether your empire is being spied. Increase your units to rise in the Hall of Fame. Collect achievements and create an alliance.

name: LEGO Hero Factory: Brain Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Who's That Pokémon?
description: A simple HTML5 game that generates silhouettes from images and gets the user to guess the name of the Pokémon shown.

name: Street Fighter III: 4rd Strike
description: A Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike hack that rebalances and adds a lot of content.

name: Sheryl Nome Chou Jikuu Virtual Clip: Ite-za Gogo Kyuu-ji Don't Be Late
description: The existence of this Macross game is close to impossible to confirm. There are bits and pieces on the internet that can validate that it did exist at some point, though as there is no proof of it ever being released it was likely cancelled before it saw the light of day.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1
description: A light 30-minute holiday special taking place at Sigmund Corp, where Neil and Eva work.

name: Dream Fallen: Vila do Chaves
description: Dream Fallen: Vila do Chaves is a psychological horror game that uses El Chavo's neighborhood as its backdrop. After a fit of rage over his son's death, Señor Barriga kills everyone in the vecindad, and now it is up to you to investigate the place while being chased by Señor Barriga and the ghosts that surround.

name: Pesadelo: O Início
description: Pesadelo is a brazilian horror game. You will experience Alex's nightmare, a young worker atormented by stories and urban legends about his next work place. Suspense is waiting for you! Run and pray to wake up!

name: Asteroids
description:
If you want to experience the same fun that the kids from 1979 were having while playing the Asteroids game, then you can download the same game ported to Windows by a developer called PJ Crossley. The game is around 2 MB in size and works on all versions of Windows. You can just double-click on the asteroids.exe file to launch the game.

The game can be controlled using the arrow keys to maneuver the spaceship and space bar to fire at the asteroids. As you hit any asteroid, it splits into multiple smaller asteroids. You can shoot these smaller asteroids as well and they will further divide into even smaller ones. Another thing that you will notice that the smaller asteroids move faster and are harder to target.

name: Archie: Riverdale Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Manuganu
description: Run, jump and slide from ropes, dodge rocks! Not enough? There is much more in Manuganu. Avoid swinging hammers and jump over moving ice blocks. Don’t get burned and jump between walls to collect coins and medallions. Break stone blocks and activate platforms before you fall into fog and much more... Manuganu is a 3D side- scroller running game, in which you control the boy “Manuganu”. Unlike other usual running games, Manuganu brings on the “Halt feature” to avoid swinging rocks, hammers, flames and other enemies with the right timing. Another important feature of Manuganu is the ability to switch from “running” mode to “rope climbing” mode when needed. But be careful! This mode has its own challenges.

name: Brooklyn Trash King
description: A short, funny IF game made in Twine. You play a hot shot tech nerd gentrifying Brooklyn who must grovel in the face of a king rodent in order to get funding for their shitty Kickstarter project.

name: Space Blaster (Lines)
description:
An experimental horror game. A simple space blaster game made from code borrowed off the internet becomes angry it was never finished.
The game starts off simple, but develops itself to entrap the user.

name: 2236 A.D. Secretary Stories
description: A prequel to 2236 A.D. which features a nonsensical story between man and AI that seems heartwarming but may actually be heartwarming. In other words, it's a visual novel about how Masuko is cute.

name: Super Angry Birds
description: Angry Birds (also known as Super Angry Birds) is a port of the Sega Genesis bootleg version of the mobile game Angry Birds to the Famicom. It does not have relation with the Nice Code version.

name: Debris
description:
Elyzabeth awakens in a cell after being attacked at the entrance to her apartment. She'll spend a long time trying to find a way out and an explanation to this, but she'll soon discover that she is not alone there.

The phone will start ringing in the room and when she picks it up, Elyzabeth won't believe what she hears:

"Hi Ellie.
You may be wondering where you are.
You Ellie, you're the reason for my pain.
And the time has come for you to pay for everything you've done to me.
This will be... the last day of your life. "

Will you dare to try to reveal the motives behind Elyzabeth's kidnapping?

name: Ruki no Zetsubo
description: Ruki Kashima, a 8 years old boy, is home alone when, due to a storm, his house is affected by a blackout. Ruki panics, but not only because he's afraid of the dark... but also because of that doll that his father keeps and that Ruki believes is cursed.

name: Bioshock & Borderlands: The Shooter Collection
description:
A compilation that includes:

- BioShock
- Borderlands

name: Pac-Man: Ticket Mania
description: Over 30 years later, the PAC is Back and better than ever! This new video redemption piece brings back the classic PAC-MAN game concept but now rewards players with tickets or a gift card. Players acquire points by munching on as many of the familiar Pac-dots and fruits as they can while being chased by the ghosts; Inky, Blinky, Pinky, and Clyde. If successful in entering the ghost house, players can win the “PAC-POT” and are treated with a mesmerizing PAC-MAN animation. Options for the “PAC-POT” can include tickets or gift cards*. The cabinet is beautifully lit from top to bottom with multicoloured LEDs as well as a spectacular LED marquee that scrolls the classic 8-bit PAC-MAN animation.

name: The Hammer's End: A Fae's Journey
description: The Hammer's End (THE) is an indie-developed 3D fantasy MMORPG with open world PvE and PvP content.

name: Enemy 2: Missing in Action
description:
The adventure in the vastness of cold space continues. After a failed research mission the crew got stuck in alien spaceships. In the fight for survival, they meet old friends and new enemies. It is an emotional roller coaster between despair and hope. The big question is: Will any human ever return to earth?

FEATURES
further story with almost 30 levels
new riddles and non-linear gameplay
miscellaneous possibilities for action
integrated help system
detailed graphic with shadow effects
atmospheric music and sound effects
over 8 hours of exciting gameplay

Experience the fast and complex action adventure in the solo run or with a friend in the excellent coop mode!

name: WolfPlay
description:
Embrace pack life as you assemble your pack, breed your wolves, hunt for food, gain and protect your territory. Battle other wolf packs and NPC creatures as you explore your world.

Develop your wolves into unique individuals and roleplay them with other members. The way you build your wolves' characters influence how they interact with the immersive world around them!

name: Big Bang West
description: "Big Bang West" is a fantasy strategy game. It offers fast and entertaining game play. You must build towns and cities, defend them against raiders and perform various objectives. Enjoy the American Wild West atmosphere in lovely cartoon graphics!

name: Phase Shift: Threats Beyond the Network
description: Phase Shift follows the story of Xargis, a genius programmer fighting against cyber terrorism in the future. Defeat your enemies and protect The Network!

name: Elminage Gothic 3D Remix: Ulm Zakir to Yami no Gishiki
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance - Special Edition
description:
In this Special Edition exclusive Japanese release, included with this game are all the DLCs:

- 30 VR Missions
- Jetstream content
- Bladewolf content
- Wood Katana weapon
- Five costumes for Raiden (including the MGS4 Raiden and Grey Fox costume)
- Metal Gear Rising theme

name: Dainty Pain
description: Sin descripción

name: Arrapha
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Gears N Gators
description: Save your captured friends from various monsters, robots, and gears while using your sword-breath

name: MazezaM Challenge
description: A homebrew puzzle video game developed for the Super Nintendo and released in cartridge by Piko Interactive in 2013.

name: Silhouette
description: Silhouette is a local co-op game for two players, played on one computer. Player one is the victim, who is trapped in a mansion. The victim must escape by finding an exit. However, the exit is locked and the victim must first find a key hidden somewhere in the house. Player two is a killer. He must stop the victim from escaping by hunting him down.

name: Histacom
description: You play a hacker in the mid 1990′s and time travel into the future, using different Operating Systems along the way!. Hack you way through 5 Windows operating systems as you work to save the world from different sources of evil.

name: Espana 1936
description: In España 1936, a turn-based strategy game from Ageod, you will experience the famous battles of Jarama, Guadalajara and Ebro, commanding the International Brigades or the Army of Africa. Can you conquer Madrid and force the Republic to surrender or will you lead the Anarchist forces of Durruti to victory?

name: Feed the Ducks
description: It always makes me happy to see ducks in a pond or a lake.

name: You Were Hallucinating the Whole Time
description: The finest modern game design technique, showcased front and center.

name: Never Have I Ever
description:
Take a shot. Answer honestly. Bare your soul. How well do you know the person sitting across from you, holding the bottle? Some secrets just aren't meant to be shared. 
 
A short horror story.

name: My Kindness is Not an Invitation For You to Touch Me
description: I made this game in 2013 after I went to PAX East, where a dude I'd just met in person pissed all over my personal boundaries and slam dunked them into a trash can. I was angry and this helped me feel much better!
